net.sf.borg.model.db

Interface DBHelper.Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JdbcDBHelper
    Enclosing class:
    DBHelper

    public static interface DBHelper.Controller
    Interface to be implemented by all DB controllers It contains methods that are not specific to a DB type
